name: Fireworks
description: "Kids still look forward to seeing the flowing shining in the night sky when they're held in their mothers' arms". (Use it to create a dazzling firework. )

name: Firmament Horn[1]
description: The mystical Pixie resides on the leaf of Yggdrasil, this Firmament Horn is the symbol of their masculinity. Legend says that the light of the horn will grow with wearer's power. "No matter where you are, Yggdrasil is at thy heart. "——Pixie folk song

name: First Test Gift Chest
description: Designed for lovable RO fans! With several fine gifts! Have a good time!

name: First Test Gift Pack
description: Designed for lovable RO fans! With numerous fine gifts! Have a good time!

name: First-aid Kit
description: Bandages, pain relievers, and secondary healing scrolls in the package can heal most injuries.

name: Fish In Mouth
description: Fish In Mouth Although it has a fishy smell, it will not deteriorate due to special treatment.

name: Fish In Mouth Blueprint
description: Fish In Mouth Although it has a fishy smell, it will not deteriorate due to special treatment.

name: Fish's Soul
description: The soul of a fish sealed in a bottle. The transparent blue light is very beautiful.

name: Flamberge [1]
description: A sword whose blade has a beautiful pattern of ripples on it. Despite its beautiful appearance, the sword is surprisingly destructive.
effect: Attack Spd ＋5%,The wearer's Def and MDef will decrease by 2/3

name: Flamberge [2]
description: A sword whose blade has a beautiful pattern of ripples on it. Despite its beautiful appearance, the sword is surprisingly destructive.
effect: Attack Spd ＋5%,The wearer's Def and MDef will decrease by 2/3

name: Flame
description: This glowing flame can be used as a material for making accessories.

name: Flame Heart
description: The ore with fire attribute. After use, Your attack turns into fire attribute and the effect lasts 15 minutes.

name: Flame Light
description: This sword was originally the King Schmidt's carrying sabre. When "The White Knight" was on expedition, Heinrich's sword has broken and Schmidt gave Heinrich his sword, hoping that he would continue to defend the Schmidt House with the sword, just like the sword once guarded Schmidt. Until Heinrich's death, he still insisted on keeping the oath to the king when he took over the [Flame Light]. (Better used as the weapon skin)

name: Flame Ring
description: The blaze, full of vitality, is wrapped in magic crystals.

name: Flame Ring [1]
description: The blaze, full of vitality, is wrapped in magic crystals.

name: Flame Wing
description: The wings of the mythical beast in Chinese legends.
